game_description: Have you got what it takes to keep the skies safe from ruthless villains? Your island paradise is being invaded, and hot-shot Keith Koala needs to jump into the gunner’s seat and fight off some of the most menacing meanies that the Aussie Islands have ever seen! Grab the controls to blow them out of the sky before they plunder everything your home has to offer. In Sky Squadron VR you take control of a plucky Koala and his friends while they defend their home from evil invaders. Grab the gun controls by both hands to aim and shoot in this classic arcade rail-shooter that sees the player destroy fighters, dismantle giant bosses and repair their plane on the fly. Invite a friend to join you in online co-op, or compete for the highest score on the global leaderboards. Features - An Australian take on the classic “Star Fox” universe with a WW2 twist - Online co-op to easily play with friends - Branching missions with different objectives - Fully destructible bosses - Compete on the globa
review_1: Cool graphics arcade game with a lot of fun, a little dizziness (considering you didn't pilot the ship its great, but you can feel it some times) Fun experience for children, limited as any demo could be.
review_2: Played the level over the he weekend And am not sure I could do a hole game it's just lacking somthing But on the pluss side no motion sicknes Fun level Down side might become repetitive Personly option 1 I would think if you coukd actuly fly the ship to avade the enamy fire and fly through or round the environment to evade or take a harder path with more rewards which would make it more interactive Option 2 Being still a rail shooter being given the option of flight path to take at a given point to Give difrent advantages disadvantages to enamies or end bosses Option 3 make it like a ball turit Give button to bash to fire rockets or shields An Option to posably switch to side gun or tail gun at points in the game This is obviusly my opinion But over all I did enjoy what I played And it is just a baiter
review_3: I played this again after a couple of months and it seems like they have done some great updates. I’m now looking forward to the full game. Keep up the good work!
review_4: I gave this three stars for one reason and one reason only because the game is fun and amazing but it's not the full game I can only play like three boards and that sucks so it’s only a Demo and I can’t wait to purchase the full game!!! I just hate when they do that it’s like a tease like I want the full game￼
review_5: I cannot join a multiplayer server but I have Wi-Fi￼. Also I’m nine years old so I cannot use discord I’m sorry your games good 10 out of 10
